EmailTemplate.subject: It was great to see you this year at Devoxx
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}} {{lead.Last Name:default=}},
Thank you for joining us and the Spring community at Devoxx Belgium. There were several great talks on serverless, Kubernetes, cloud platforms, and Spring. Pivotal engineers delivered a handful of talks on things like Java, Spring, Kotlin, event-driven architecture, and DevOps. Want more? If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-Devoxx-Belgium-germany-q418]]> to begin a discussion.
In the meantime, if you are looking for spare capacity for CI builds, temporary development or test environments, check out Pivotal Web Services <[[https://run.pivotal.io/spring?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-Devoxx-Belgium-germany-q418]]>, a great public cloud for running Spring Framework (and .NET) on Cloud Foundry. Don’t forget to download your free copy of the O’Reilly eBook, Migrating to Cloud-Native Applications <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-Devoxx-Belgium-germany-q418]]>, a useful IT management primer on why cloud-native matters.
Looking for more content on the latest in Spring, Cloud Foundry, and Kubernetes? Check out these resources or share them with your team:
- Learn about the latest Spring releases by following the Spring team blog <[[https://spring.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-Devoxx-Belgium-germany-q418]]> - Understand everything you wanted to know about serverless <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/nov-8-everything-you-wanted-to-know-about-serverless-but-were-afraid-to-ask-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-Devoxx-Belgium-germany-q418]]>, but were afraid to ask - See how to bring app services to Cloud Foundry and Kubernetes <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/an-inside-look-at-the-open-service-broker-api?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-Devoxx-Belgium-germany-q418]]> environment via the Open Service Broker - Find out why running microservices on Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/running-microservices-on-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-Devoxx-Belgium-germany-q418]]> is the way to go
Don’t miss the latest updates <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pks-1-2?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-Devoxx-Belgium-germany-q418]]> to Pivotal Container Service (PKS) powered by Kubernetes. Stay in touch with our team and join the Spring conversation on our blogs, podcasts, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/springcentral?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-Devoxx-Belgium-germany-q418]]>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event.
Thanks, The Pivotal and Spring Team
